title: PlayerMint: Community Access NFTs
description: ゲーム分野のクリエイターの大半は、コミュニティに広告を出さずにマネタイズするための有効な手段を持っていません。

f6_assessments.q0: Successfully addresses the challenge by using NFTs as a way to get access to certain features the content creator decides on. The gaming community is massive and this could cause a lot of NFT movement.
f6_assessments.q1: Already committed team with the relevant experience to run this project. I don't see any plutus developer experience though. It would boost voter and CA confidence if they knew who was developing the backend of your project.  The budget allocation and plan seems sensible.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal has enough info to track its progress and success. They provided key metrics to measure. They also provided a possible launch date. They have supplied the tokenomics of their PMX coin and how the NFT sales will work. Keeping scalability in mind and explaining it in their white paper. Maybe adding a voting system for PMX holders to address and vote on future challenges that might arise is a good idea to be extra resilient.

f6_assessments.q0: Since the goal of this challenge is "NFT Business Model" on Cardano, this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge. The proposal clearly articulates how to add value to the Cardano ecosystem through this game system and the key objectives of the proposal are in line with the challenge. Being a gamer, I understand the importance of this project and the effects that the gaming industry will benefit from. The description of the project is clear and well structured and even those who have never approached the gaming world would understand it. Well done. I have no advice for you on this part.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has years of experience in games and blockchain and they have already demonstrated that they know how to do a project as they claim to have been successful in the fund4. As for the plan presented, I could give him some advice by working as a project manager in an IT consulting company.. So they worked very well on scope management, the objectives are clear thanks also to the attached video. ROI is ambitious but possible. Good luck.
f6_assessments.q2: Yes, the information provided is more than enough, if they wanted to further increase the information, the advice I would give is to improve scheduling management. Yes, the information provided is more than enough, if they wanted to further increase the information, the advice I would give is to improve the management of timetables. As for the scheduling they have specified to go into production in December 2021, the advice I can give is to try to do a GANTT project with a more detailed to-do roadmap at the month / function level developed and attach it to the proposal in a way also give to those who support you a vision of the continuation of the project.

f6_assessments.q0: This team presents an idea how to reward gamers through issuing specific NFTs to their community. This project is based on a successful Fund 4 proposal. The requested funds will be used for developing the NFT marketplace on their platform and the created business model is based around NFTs. Therefore this proposal fits into this challenge. A solution like this could attract the blockchain gamer community to Cardano, which shows the potential positive impact of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has already been successful in getting a proposal funded in Fund 4. 
The team is very active in the community and has the skills and enthusiasm to realize their vision. The plan presented is well developed and gives a good understanding of the newly created use cases. A little more information about the technical implementation would help to better understand the overall scope of the project. The budget is understandable and reasonable from my perspective. Only the marketing budget could be explained in more detail. What marketing strategy is being pursued, what exactly is the money being spent on? In general, I see it as likely that this proposal will be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: The goal and the result are clearly formulated. The team also clarifies by when the solution will be implemented. Success metrics are also clearly stated. The only thing that can be improved in this regard is to make appropriate documentation available, through which the community can monitor the progress of the project. Overall, the project is good to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal clearly explains how it will tap into a Market that is already successfully being explored by other NFT-creators.
f6_assessments.q1: Given the nature of this proposal I would like to see more about the technical background of the teammembers, since the team is actively involved in the community and funded as well already, I am more likely to believe that they will be able to attract additional talent if they need it.
f6_assessments.q2: i think the proposers are clearly auditable, they have set clear objectives and (maybe even too) ambitous metrics which fit well into the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: As a avid gamer this is a magnificent idea and one that could bring smart contract utility to a demographic prone to find blockchain technology interesting. The revenue generated can inpact the growth of Cardano that would lead it's mass adoption reaching multiple venues in the space.
f6_assessments.q1: The combined experience is quite extensive and the knowledge show in the plan reveals great pontential to execute the solutions posed in this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided show a wide array of applications and the distribution of fungible and non fungible ideas to be incorporated to the blockchain. The detail plan, metrics, demographics and funding use are well balanced. The experience is relevant to audit the progress and success of the proposals solution.

solution: コミュニティへのアクセスを提供するNFTを通じて、ゲームコンテンツ制作者とそのファンが相互に利益を得られる方法を提供する。
experience: 私たちのチームは、ゲームで45年、ブロックチェーンで10年の経験を持っています。私たちはProject CatalystのFund4で成功しました。
